QuestData.Title: Recon Essentials
QuestData.Description: We used to have more stuff around here. I think there was a spyglass somewhere nearby, along with a smithing tuyere.$b$bI'm pretty certain that they've been stolen by Dark Iron dwarves. Yes, I know that I'm a Dark Iron dwarf! I'm talking about the bad ones that live down in that gorge.$B$BYou'd best check the steamsmiths that work just south of here. They'd be most likely to use tools like these.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and return the Smithing Tuyere and Lookout's Spyglass.
QuestData.CompletionText: If you're here for the reward, you're gonna have to give me the stolen goods.
